title: Roasted Chicken with Lemon Butter
method: Preheat oven to 400F (200C). Melt butter and mix with lemon juice. Season chicken with salt and pepper. Brush with lemon butter mixture. Roast for about 1 hour or until internal temperature reaches 165F.

title: Creamy Alfredo Pasta
method: Boil pasta. Meanwhile, melt butter in a pan with garlic, then add cream. Stir and add Parmesan. Season with salt and pepper. Combine with pasta and serve.

title: Garden Salad with Balsamic Dressing
method: Chop the vegetables. In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, and pepper. Toss salad with dressing.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
method: Melt butter and chocolate together. Whisk in sugar, eggs, yolks, and flour. Pour into ramekins. Bake at 425F (220C) for 10-12 minutes until edges are firm but center is runny.
